H0.text: Decreases is the force of attraction between a magnet and a metal paper clip as the distance between them increases.

H1.text: Increases is the force of attraction between a magnet and a metal paper clip as the distance between them increases.

H2.text: Remains the same is the force of attraction between a magnet and a metal paper clip as the distance between them increases.

A3.text: The strength of the magnetic field decreases with distance from the wire.

A4.text: For an infinite length wire, the strength is inversely proportional to the distance.
